news.title: Maduro overthrow in oil-rich Venezuela unlikely to shake energy markets in the near term
news.summary: Venezuela has the world's largest oil reserves, but its oil production is relatively small. Venezuela's oil production has been in decline since the 2008 financial crisis.

news.title: Trump's removal of Maduro prompts questions from Congress
news.summary: Congressional lawmakers say they were not briefed before President Donald Trump launched a land attack on Venezuela and deposed President Nicolas Maduro. Congress was not briefed on the attack, lawmakers say.

news.title: Caribbean flights resume after Venezuela attack as airlines add extra service for stranded travelers
news.summary: U.S. airlines resume flights to Puerto Rico and other Caribbean destinations early Sunday. Aviation authorities lifted temporary airspace restrictions on the island on Saturday.

news.title: U.S. indictment against Venezuela President Maduro, wife is unsealed
news.summary: The indictment was unsealed hours after U.S. forces launched an attack on Venezuela and captured its president Nicolas Maduro and his wife, Cilia Flores.

news.title: Watch Trump's full comments following the U.S. strike against Venezuela
news.summary: President Donald Trump is scheduled to speak Saturday morning following a stunning, large-scale attack on Venezuela overnight. Trump is expected to address the nation from the White House.

news.title: How Trump’s Venezuela raid could worsen America’s affordability crisis
news.summary: A spike in diesel oil prices could make goods and materials more expensive to deliver. It could also lead to higher inflation in the U.S.

news.title: ‘I’m on a fixed budget’: Silver and gold are too rich for my blood. What else can I gift my adorable grandchildren?
news.summary: “I’ve already listed them as beneficiaries on my 401(k),” he says. “Ive already list them as beneficiary on my401(k)”

news.title: ‘I’m fed up’: My selfish mother-in-law has controlled me for 30 years. How can I regain my power?
news.summary: "I'm almost 50 years old. Enough is enough," she says. "I am exhausted by it. I am exhausted.”

news.title: Here are the most popular Moneyist columns of 2025
news.summary: Bad executors, greedy friends, inheritances, elder abuse and qualifying for Medicaid featured as the most-read Moneyist columns of the year.

news.title: ‘I have absolutely no idea what to do’: I was diagnosed with Alzheimer’s disease and inherited $400K. How do I invest it?
news.summary: “I’m retired and 72. I don’t want to be here anymore,” he says. “I just want to go home.”
